content: सत् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (ती|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) {@--1@} Being, existing, existent; संतः स्वतः प्रकाशंते गुणा न परतो नृणां <ls>Bv. 1. 120</ls>; सत्कल्पवृक्षे वने <ls>Ś. 7. 12.</ls> {@--2@} Real, essential, true. {@--3@} Good, virtuous, chaste; सती सती योगविसृष्टदेहा <ls>Ku. 1. 21</ls>; <ls>Ś. 5. 17.</ls> {@--4@} Noble, worthy, high; as in सत्कुलम्. {@--5@} Right, proper. {@--6@} Best, excellent. {@--7@} Venerable, respectable. {@--8@} Wise, learned. {@--9@} Handsome, beautiful. {@--10@} Firm, steady. {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} A good or virtuous man, a sage; आदानं हि विसर्गाय सतां वारिमुचामिव <ls>R. 4. 86</ls>; अविरतं परकार्यकृतां सतां मधुरिमातिशयेन वचोऽमृतं <ls>Bv. 1. 113</ls>; <ls>Bh. 2. 78</ls>; <ls>R. 1. 10.</ls> {%--<ab>n.</ab>%} {@--1@} That which really exists entity, existence, essence. {@--2@} The really existent truth, reality. {@--3@} Good; as in सदसत् <ab>q. v.</ab> {@--4@} Brahman or the Supreme Spirit. {@--5@} <ab>Ved.</ab> Water. (सत्कृ means {1} to respect treat with respect, receive hospitably. {2} to honour, worship, adore {3} to adorn).
सती {@--1@} A virtuous or good woman (or wife); <ls>Ku. 1. 21.</ls> {@--2@} A female ascetic. {@--3@} <ab>N.</ab> of the goddess Durgā; <ls>Ku. 1. 21.</ls> {@--4@} A kind of fragrant earth.
